trends: There have been no other sightings in Sunbury-on-Thames
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson may 8th 2009, myself and a friend whitnessed the sighting of 4 objects neither of us could explain. 3 orange objects appeared from the sky traveling at varying speeds at a fairly high height. the objects were spherical\triangular shape and all moved in the same direction. there was also no sound from the objects. this lasted about 10 minutes until all 3 had disappeared. my friend had tried to video it, however it failed to record. roughly 5 minutes later after debating about what it could possibly be with no obvious answers; another orange light came from the same direction out of nowhere, again at a different speed to those previously. my friend tried to record it, however the video camera froze for the first ever time. within about 5 minutes the object had disappeared in the same direction of the 3 previously. after spending much time debating what it could have been, i still cannot find any logical explanation for it.
